item.title: Scraping Web Data on UITFs using R
item.description: Introduction Surveying active UITFs Gathering UITF symbols Cleaning up Augmenting the dataset Gathering UITF Information Merging all_uitfs and fund_info Scraping Historical Price Data Summary Introduction This post is an example of scraping the web for specific data we would like to have for analysis. In this example, Iâ€™m going to gather data on UITFs in the Philippines. UITFs or Unit Investment Trust Funds are a type of pooled funds, similar but still somewhat different to mutual funds.
